memberdef.name: FTC_GCACHE_LOOKUP_CMP
memberdef.initializer: FT_BEGIN_STMNT \ FTC_GCache _gcache = FTC_GCACHE( cache ); \ FTC_GQuery _gquery = (FTC_GQuery)( query ); \ FTC_MruNode_CompareFunc _fcompare = (FTC_MruNode_CompareFunc)(famcmp); \ FTC_MruNode _mrunode; \ \ \ _gquery->gindex = (gindex); \ \ FTC_MRULIST_LOOKUP_CMP( &_gcache->families, _gquery, _fcompare, \ _mrunode, error ); \ _gquery->family = FTC_FAMILY( _mrunode ); \ if ( !error ) \ { \ FTC_Family _gqfamily = _gquery->family; \ \ \ _gqfamily->num_nodes++; \ \ FTC_CACHE_LOOKUP_CMP( cache, nodecmp, hash, query, node, error ); \ \ if ( --_gqfamily->num_nodes == 0 ) \ FTC_FAMILY_FREE( _gqfamily, _gcache ); \ } \ FT_END_STMNT

memberdef.argsstring: (FTC_GNode gnode, FTC_GQuery gquery, FTC_Cache cache, FT_Bool *list_changed)
memberdef.name: FTC_GNode_Compare
